strapiPost.title: A Stadium Tour
strapiPost.content:
For the first time in over 7 years, Garth Brooks is coming to Arkansas.

  • One shot: The Donald W. Razorback Stadium is set to host Garth Brooks on Saturday, April 23 2022 for the first time ever, and it will be the only stadium appearance for Arkansas or Oklahoma on Brooksâ€™ 2022 tour. 
  • Get seats: Concert tickets will be on sale at 10a on Friday, Dec 3 and will cost $94.95. It would be the perfect Christmas gift for the Garth Brooks lover of the family.

Get Tickets HERE.
